Message:
and it was time for Belle to
finally leave the orphanage.

It’ll feel a little lonelier here,
but it doesn’t mean we’ll
never see each other again.
I have to send her off with a smile.

“Hey, Belle won’t be able to
leave if everyone keeps crying.”

As I was calming down
the children,

Belle looked like she felt
embarrassed saying
those words to me.

This will always
be your home, Belle.

Belle blushed as
she smiled back at me.

Then, she spread her wings
and left the nest.

I tried to be strong
in front of the children,

but Belle’s departure left
a big hole in my heart.

something happened that
overwhelmed me with happiness.
